DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the novel deep TMS H-Coil design as an augmentation measure in the treatment of medication resistant major depression. Stimulation is administered with and without cognitive-emotional provocation.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Deep TMS H-Coil in the Treatment of Major Depression- Augmentation of Antidepressant Medication
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed as suffering from treatment resistant major depression Right laterality other major axis I diagnosis severe axis II diagnosis risk factors to convulsions history of drug abuse in the past year
